column5: I am proud to say that A few good friends of mine that share the same passion for fishing have started a new website here in the States. It is a place that they have started and it deals with mostly cat fishing on the big rivers across the nation. In the process of designing the webpage they included a link to get to OFC to hopefully bring people from both sides of the border together and learn about the local variety of fishin that is available to all of us. If you are curious and want to see some big Cats here is the place to go. As the cat fishermen show up lets see if we can get them to come up north and catch a few fish with teeth.  link to catfishnation  Art
Cool site,Art,and the background tune is one of my fav's.........Hope everything is well and good down your way......TC and tight lines all........Chuck......
Nice site, Art. Leave it up here for us to enjoy please.
Cool site Art.  I couldn't find the OFC link tho  Funny song     He just needs to teach her how to fish s'all.  Joey
OFC link is at the bottom of the page
That makes me want to start my own site...  HushPuppie Nation!!!
Hey Art, would that site be interested in any of my catfish pics?
I dont see why not Dawg send them to me and I will see if they want to use them.  Art
That would be great Art!!! Thanks!!!  I love being half naked on the internet!!!

Alas, being on dial-up has kept me from it   I tried, but it wouldn't let me go anywhere else until it downloaded....might leave it on tonight and by the time I get up I might be able to check it out more.  Hope so, would like to see some big cat pics  Maureen
